parameters.name: AcceptLanguage
parameters.description:
The language of the response. Valid values:

zh: Chinese en: English

parameters.name: Config
parameters.description: The plug-in configuration. Configurations of WebAssembly plug-ins are in the YAML format, and configurations of Lua plug-ins are in the Lua code.

parameters.name: ConfigLevel
parameters.description:
The application scope of the plug-in.

*   0: global
*   1: route
*   2: domain name

parameters.name: Enable
parameters.description: Specifies whether to enable the plug-in.

parameters.name: GatewayUniqueId
parameters.description: The unique ID of the gateway.

parameters.name: Id
parameters.description: The ID of the plug-in configuration.

parameters.name: PluginId
parameters.description: The ID of the gateway plug-in.
